Author: avoao
Text: Idk, I got told I was too fat lots of times. And even if not outright, someone looks at you while you're eating or exposing your body in any way and you *know* what they're thinking. But yeah, no comments are okay.

Author: aleafamongtrees
Text: Why is it only ok to comment on peoples weight when they’re thin? It’s such a double standard. You can say “you’re too thin” but you sure as hell couldn’t say “you’re too fat.” Whenever people tell me I need to gain weight, I just nervously laugh but in my head I’m saying “yeah well you need to lose weight.” It really shouldn’t be ok to comment on anyone’s weight.
